### Spliting a database into groups

Once a padloc-db is validated, it is useful to split it into groups for
batched searches with padloc.

Read `sys_groups.txt`.

```{r, message = FALSE}
path <- padlocdev_example("sys_groups.txt")
sys_groups <- read_sys_groups(path)
head(sys_groups)
```
